entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [wasm] Test run failing with `exiting due to exception: 613560632` from V8 #74303
  • [wasm][aot] Uncaught errors in `System.Runtime.Tests` #74302
  • F# compiler crashes with DOTNET_TieredPGO=1 #74295
    7.0.0
  • Exception of type 'Interop+AndroidCrypto+SslException' was thrown. #74292
  • Spmi-diff is showing diffs that are not related to the PR #74287
  • Huge performance drop for fsc.exe/dll #74286
    7.0.0

Closed

  • [NativeAOT] RhGetCodeTarget fails if executable code cannot be read #73906
    Future
  • [NativeAOT] PlatformNotSupportedException when creating an array #74299
  • .NET 7 Preview 7 - Polymorphic Deserialization Fails When Base Type Is Abstract #74294
  • Unable to call dll exported functions compiled in msys2 from C# PInvoke #74289
  • crash in JIT/Methodical/Coverage/copy_prop_byref_to_native_int on Mono #74049
    8.0.0
  • crossgen2/VM layout mismatch in CI #73728
    7.0.0
  • On macOS, dotnet process seems to launch itself several times and maxes out CPU #66419
    Future
  • Regression in TimeZoneInfo for "Central Brazilian Standard Time" in .NET 6.0 #61842
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • [Mono] Only enable Arm intrinsics for full aot mode #74301
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Add faster DAC EnumMemoryRegion option with less memory usage #74300
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • fix for SIP regions #74298
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0-rc1' => 'release/7.0' #74297
    area-System.Numerics
  • Update Xunit to 2.4.2 #74296
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Fix one more Crossgen2 field layout mismatch with runtime #74293
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Avoid divide by zero in superpmi.py tpdiff #74291
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Fix loading of R2R assemblies from byte arrays/streams #74290
  • Roll forward to the latest 6.0.x builds #74288
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono

Merged

  • [release/7.0-rc1] [wasm] Unwrap exception when calling entrypoint #74263
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Reenable test Runtime_34170 outside of Arm32 runs #74185
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Directory.CreateDirectory: create missing parents using default UnixFileMode. #74277
    area-System.IO
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Disable failing runtime extra platforms tests #74264
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Remove AES and SubtleCrypto from WASM #74246
    arch-wasm, area-System.Security
  • [release/7.0-rc1] [WASM] Fix deadlock when instantiating pthread worker pool #74243
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Add runs for release/7.0* on community architectures #74239
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Disable matching constants for vectors that needs upper half to be save/restore #74192
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Fix for Random failures in System.Numerics.Tests.modpowTest.ModPowAxiom test #74181
    area-System.Numerics
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0-rc1' => 'release/7.0' #74205
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update Xunit to 2.4.2 #74262
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Add a way to suppress all trimming warnings #74220
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Disable JIT/Methodical/Coverage/copy_prop_byref_to_native_int on all configs #74265
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Fix one more Crossgen2 field layout mismatch with runtime #73978
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add guards around memcmp and memset to fix ubsan runtime errors. #74282
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Unwrap exception when calling entrypoint #74235
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Disable Int128 use in by value ABI scenarios, and fix field layout behavior #74279
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Update arcade to 7.0.0-beta.22418.4 #74210
    area-codeflow
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Don't NativeAOT crossgen on ARM64 #74221
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Don't track current field of state machines #74216
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Clean up EH routines #74270
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • Fix loading of R2R assemblies from byte arrays/streams #74118
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr

Updated

  • [release/7.0-rc1] net7.0 + net6.0 workload multitargeting changes #74018
    blocking-release, area-Infrastructure-mono, 7.0.0
  • Make Type.GetTypeCode/IsEnum intrinsics #71685
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • update Helix arm64 images #73963
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Fix leak caused by not disposing the scoped parent service provider #74261
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, 7.0.0
  • Remove ThreadPool native implementation #71719
    area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Omit the JS sync context if threads are not enabled #74236
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [release/7.0-rc1] [wasm] Add new javascript API types #74222
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Improve JitDisasm for top-level statements, expose DumpJittedMethods in Release #74090
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Improve performance of Tar library #74281
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • add guards around some calls to memset to silence ubsan #73953
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Unix]: AcceptAsync with existing AcceptSocket support on Unix #73499
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution
  • Add markdown readme for System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager #72772
    area-System.Configuration, community-contribution
  • Fix gtGetClassHandle for static fields (R2R only) #74075
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Recursive validation #67810
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations, community-contribution
  • Backport crossgen2 fix for musl-libc #73986
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Use the register of CAST for contained index operator #74275
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
